<template>
  <v-container fluid class="mt-5 myContainer">
    <v-card class="myCard">
      <v-row style="height:100%;width: 105%;">
        <v-col class="containerMenuAside" sm="2">
          <menu-aside :notesLength="notesLength"/>
        </v-col>
        <v-col sm="9">
          <v-container>
            <v-row>
              <v-col>
                <InputSearchNote @onSearchNote="searchNote"/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-row class="containerNotes">
              <v-col sm="4" v-for="(item, index) in allNotes" v-bind:key="index" v-show="item.show">
                <CardNote :title="item.noteTitle"
                          :description="item.noteDescription"
                          :date="item.date"
                          :priority="item.priorityLevel"
                          :itsDone="item.itsDone"
                          :indexNote="index"
                          @onDeleteNote="deleteNote"/>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-container>
          <FormNewNote @onSaveNote="saveNota"/>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
     
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import FormNewNote from "../components/Notes/FormNewNote.vue"
import InputSearchNote from "../components/Notes/InputSearchNote.vue"
import CardNote from "../components/Notes/CardNote.vue"
import MenuAside from "../components/MenuAside.vue";
export default {
  name: "Home",
  components: {
    MenuAside,
    FormNewNote,
    InputSearchNote,
    CardNote
  },
  data: () => ({
    allNotes:[
    {
      idNote:1,
      noteTitle: "My first note",
      noteDescription: "You can now download an archive of all your data within the next 24 hours.",
      priorityLevel:'Low',
      itsDone: true,
      date: "13/09/2022",
      status: true,
      show: true
    },
    {
      idNote:2,
      noteTitle: "My second note",
      noteDescription: "This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption.       priorityLevel:'Medium',
      itsDone: false,
      date: "15/09/2022",
      status: true,
      show: true
    },
    {
      idNote:2,
      noteTitle: "My second note",
      noteDescription: "This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption.       status: true,
      show: true
    },{

      noteTitle: "My second note",
      noteDescription: "This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption. This is the second desciption.       priorityLevel:'Medium',
      itsDone: false,
      date: "15/09/2022",
      status: true,
      show: true
    },],
  }),
  methods:{
    saveNota(newNota){
      this.allNotes.push(newNota);
    },
    deleteNote(index){
      // Swal.fire(
      //   'Good job!',
      //   'You clicked the button!',
      //   'success'
      // )

      this.allNotes[index].show = false;
      this.allNotes[index].status = false;
      //this.allNotes.slice(index,1);
    },
    searchNote(txtSearch){
      for(let i=0; i<this.allNotes.length;i++){
        if(this.allNotes[i].noteTitle.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase()) ||
           this.allNotes[i].noteDescription.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase()) ||
           this.allNotes[i].priorityLevel.toLowerCase().includes(txtSearch.toLowerCase())){
          this.allNotes[i].show = true
        }
        else{
          this.allNotes[i].show = false
        }
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    notesLength() {
      let notesNotDone = this.allNotes.filter(note => !note.itsDone)

      return notesNotDone.length;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
  .v-application--wrap{
    background: url("../assets/fondoBG.jpg");
  }
  .myContainer, .myCard{
    height: 83vh !important;
    width: 95vw;
  }
  .myCard{
    /* background-color: #F8F9FD; */
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;
  }
  .containerMenuAside{
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--bottom, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--bottom{
    bottom: 70px;
  }
  .v-btn--absolute.v-btn--right, .v-btn--fixed.v-btn--right {
    right: 65px;
  }
  .containerNotes{
    overflow-x: hidden;
    overflow-y: auto;
    height: 63vh;
    margin-right: -60px;
  }
  ::-webkit-scrollbar {
      width: 5px;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
      background-color: #ef6e2887;
      border-radius: 5px;
} 
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
      background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
} 
</style>
